content: Zapakiran in neuporabljen mobi: 2 SIM Card: Nano + Nano SIM, Camera: 13.0MP front camera + 13.0MP + 2.0MP back cameras, Display: 5.5 inch, IPS 1920 x 1080 Pixel screen (FHD).
